description:
Souta runs into his old childhood friend, Shoukanji Kikuno, who loves to spoil him. Quest Dorm is in shatters, and Kikuno asks the school elder, Ryuukishibara Tsumugi, and the student council president, Seiteikouji Mimori for help. They ask for the dorm to be rebuilt, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Girls Are in the Dorm. But I Can`t Say It Yet. Wait Until Tomorrow.
Kono Ryou ni Ane-tachi ga Iru. Daga, Ima wa Mada Ienai. Ashita made Matte Kure
Mes sœurs vivent avec moi. Mais je le garde secret. Jusqu`à demain.
هناك أخت كبيرة في هذه البناية، لكن لا يمكنني قول هذا الآن، انتظر حتى الغد
この寮に姉たちがいる. だが, 今はまだ言えない. 明日まで待ってくれ
